title: BRIEF-Italtile Declares Gross Special Cash Dividend Of 23 Cents Per Ordinary Share
text:
BRIEF-Italtile Declares Gross Special Cash Dividend Of 23 Cents Per Ordinary Share

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Sep 10, 2019 10:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Italtile Declares Gross Special Cash Dividend Of 23 Cents Per Ordinary Share Sept 10 (Reuters) - Italtile Ltd : * BOARD DECLARED A GROSS SPECIAL CASH DIVIDEND OF 23.0 CENTS PER ORDINARY SHARE * BOARD DECLARED GROSS SPECIAL CASH DIVIDEND IN LIGHT OF BEE TRANSACTION AND CO'S CASH RESERVES BEING IN EXCESS OF OPERATIONAL REQUIREMENTS

BRIEF-Italtile Declares Gross Special Cash Dividend Of 23 Cents Per Ordinary Share
description: BRIEF-Italtile Declares Gross Special Cash Dividend Of 23 Cents Per Ordinary Share
